# Disallow all crawlers and bots from accessing this site
User-agent: *
Disallow: /

# Disallow specific search engines
User-agent: Googlebot
Disallow: /

User-agent: Bingbot
Disallow: /

User-agent: Slurp
Disallow: /

User-agent: DuckDuckBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: Baiduspider
Disallow: /

User-agent: YandexBot
Disallow: /

# Prevent indexing of assets
User-agent: *
Disallow: /assets/
